column5: Fished the Niagara  we did well on a bait rig, weather was great.  caught about 7 all day.  lost somthing on a minnow too.  can't wait to go back this weekend.
Nice fish.  It sure is great seeing these soft water reports again
This was Lake Ontario on Sunday:    The Niagara was much nicer it seems.
Great report and nice fish.  Billfish, what was the water clarity and were there any ice flows?  Man Gerry, that looks mean out there.  Did you take your immodium  Joey
nice fish...now where's the other six pics !!!! Just kiddin around.....we live off pick posts here, if you haven't noticed !!!

Joey, that was just out from Port Dalhousie. The east winds came up late morning and the lake got quite bumpy, we saw the odd 5 footer. But, no immodium for my partner and I, luckily for us we don't tend to get seasick.
